    • Method Detail

      • getTagsString

        java.lang.String getTagsString()
        Returns the tags that observe this holiday.
        Returns:
        a comma-separated string of the string codes of the tags that observe this holiday, in alphabetical order

      • setTagsString

        void setTagsString(java.lang.String tagsString)
        Sets the tags that observe this holiday.
        Parameters:
        tagsString - a comma-separated string of the string codes of the tags that observe this holiday

      • getTagsArray

        HolidayTagCode[] getTagsArray()
        Returns the holiday's tags.
        Returns:
        an array of the holiday's tags

      • setTagsArray

        void setTagsArray(HolidayTagCode[] tags)
        Sets the holiday's tags.
        Parameters:
        tags - the tags

      • getTagRange

        HolidayTagCode[] getTagRange()
        Returns the available holiday tags.
        Returns:
        an array of the available holiday tags

      • getZoneList

        java.util.List getZoneList()
        Returns an alphabetized arraylist of the zones covered by the given region. Zones are represented as strings. Strips leading and trailing whitespace.
        Returns:
        a list of zones

      • getZones

        java.lang.String getZones()
        Returns an alphabetized arraylist of the zones covered by the given region. Zones are represented as strings. Strips leading and trailing whitespace.
        Returns:
        a comma-separated list of zones

      • setZones

        void setZones(java.lang.String zones)
        Deprecated. Use #setZoneCodes Holidays are heterogeneous therefore this method should not be used.
        Set the zones (comma-delimited list) for the region.
        Parameters:
        zones - comman separated list of zones

      • getFilterCriteria

        ZoneSearchCriteria getFilterCriteria()
        The filter criteria, used for the region UI only.

      • setFilterCriteria

        void setFilterCriteria(ZoneSearchCriteria filterCriteria)
        The filter criteria, used for the region UI only.

      • setZoneCodes

        void setZoneCodes(java.lang.String[] zones)
        Set the zones.
        Parameters:
        zones - the zones

      • getZoneCodes

        java.lang.String[] getZoneCodes()
        An array of the region's zones. If the filter criteria is set, it filters the return set by the filter criteria.
        Returns:
        an array of the zones that the region contains.

      • containsZone

        boolean containsZone(Country country,
                   ZoneType zoneType,
                   java.lang.String zone)
        If this region contains a zone of the given type and value? The string matching is case-insensitive NOTE: this will not match if a zip+4 value is provided. You must strip off the +4 before passing to this method.
        Parameters:
        zoneType - the zone type, must not be null
        zone - the zone string, must not be null
        Returns:
        true if the region containsZone a zone of the given type, false otherwise

      • getHolidayZones

        HolidayZone[] getHolidayZones(ZoneType zt)
        This wraps the getHolidayZonesQuery(ZoneType) method, converting the result to an array of HolidayZone objects.
        Parameters:
        zt - the zone type
        Returns:
        region zones of the specified type.

      • getHolidayZonesQuery

        IQueryBeanResult<HolidayZone> getHolidayZonesQuery(ZoneType zt)
        This returns the set of HolidayZones of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        zt - the zonetype to filter the HolidayZone objects by.
        Returns:
        a queryprocessor of HolidayZone

      • removeNullZones

        void removeNullZones()
        This will delete all null zones.
